title._content: Image taken from page 157 of 'The Beggar's Benison: or, a Hero, without a name; but, with an aim. A Clydesdale Story. [By George Mills.] Illustrated by upwards of 300 amateur pen and ink sketches'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Beggar's Benison: or, a Hero, without a name; but, with an aim. A Clydesdale Story. [By George Mills.] Illustrated by upwards of 300 amateur pen and ink sketches" Contributor: MILLS, George - of Glasgow Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12625.bb.1." Volume: 02 Page: 157 Place of Publishing: London & New York Date of Publishing: 1866 Publisher: Cassell & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000251438 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
